content: Electrical Connector S-BT-EF HL Threaded screw-in stud (multilayer coated carbon steel - corrosion protection comparable to HDG) for electrical connections on steel in mildly corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast and easy installation Enhanced protection against static electricity Enhanced safety – allows electrical current to flow through the stud and then discharges it properly into the base material Suitable for use on most standard steel structures and pipes Suitable for use in mildly corrosive environments (C3) Applications Functional bonding Protective bonding Terminal connection Bonding and earthing/grounding Equipotential bonding For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Point type: Blunt tip Base materials: Steel Corrosion protection: Duplex coating equivalent to 45 µm hot dipped galvanized Technical Data | Point type | Blunt tip | Base materials | Steel | Corrosion protection | Duplex coating equivalent to 45 µm hot dipped galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Indoors or mildly corrosive environment, Outdoor, mildly corrosive | Material | Carbon steel | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2346072 - Elec. connector S-BT-EF W10/15 AN 6 HL - Package Size 100 pc
